import React from "react"; const DIsplayItem = () => { const [selectedComponent, setSelectedComponent] = useState(null); // Store the selected component const openModal = (component) => { setSelectedComponent(component); }; const closeModal = () => { setSelectedComponent(null); }; return ( <> {selectedComponent ? () : (
Bed
Sofa

Curtains

)} ) } export default DIsplayItem;
